title: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai: Relay Shousetsu wa Ketsumatsu ga Hanpanai
original_name: 僕は友達が少ない リレー小説は結末が半端ない L(゜ □ ゜)」
opening_song: "Zannenkei Rinjinbu (Hoshi Futatsu Han) (残念系隣人部 ★★☆(星ふたつ半))" by Tomodachi Tsukuritai (友達つくり隊) (Marina Inoue, Kanae Itou, Nozomi Yamamoto, Misato Fukuen, Kana Hanazawa, and Yuka Iguchi)
ending_song: "Kimi wa Tomodachi (君は友達)" by Ryohei Kimura, Marina Inoue, Kanae Itou, Nozomi Yamamoto, Misato Fukuen, Kana Hanazawa, and Yuka Iguchi
sinopse: Unaired 13th episode of Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai.
